text:
rOhi#tO dhUqmrarO#hitaH kaqrkandhu#rOhitaqstE prA#jApaqtyA baqBrura#ruqNaba#BruqH Suka#baBruqstE rauqdrAH SyEta#H SyEtAqkShaH SyEta#grIvaqstE pi#tRudEvaqtyA$stiqsraH kRuqShNA vaqSA vA#ruqNya#stiqsraH SvEqtA vaqSAH sauqryO# maitrAbAr.haspaqtyA dhUqmrala#lAmAstUpaqrAH || 42 
(rOhi#taqH-ShaDva(gm)#SatiH) (A11)
